entries.content: Starting console.log cleanup in header-controller folder. Found 14 files with console statements. Successfully cleaned: HistoryEventListener.js (4 removed), DropdownStateManager.js (5 removed), SessionPopulator.js (2 removed). Need to clean remaining 11 files including HistoryDataLoader, HistoryViewController, SessionClickHandler and others.

COMPLETED: Console log cleanup in header-controller folder. Removed ALL console.* statements (58 total) from 17 files. Deleted DropdownDebugLogger.js utility file. All production logger.* statements (75 total) were preserved. Files cleaned include: HistoryDataLoader, HistoryViewController, SessionClickHandler, HistoryEventListener, DropdownStateManager, SessionPopulator, DOMInitializer, LoadingStateManager, InitializationCoordinator, MenuContainerBuilder (2 versions), MenuItemBuilder, EventListenerManager, SessionEventListener, HistoryMessageTransformer, and both IconResolver files.
